feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 03:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
